long_description: The Patagonia Switchback sports bra provides active women seamless comfort and plenty of support for high-impact activities. The Patagonia Switchback C/D bra is suitable for high-impact activities. Designed to wick moisture and provide high breathability, the lightweight fabric blend is soft and comfortable; plus, it features high recycled content. Lower elastic band provides light support and adjusts to fit around the ribcage. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out sports bra to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Switchback sports bra provides active women seamless comfort and plenty of support for high-impact activities.
